title: Status Effects
content: Pass without Trace Targets gain a +10 bonus to Stealth checks. Protection from Energy Target gains Resistance to Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder damage. Protection from Evil and Good The target is protected against aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead. These creatures have disadvantage on Attack Rolls against the target, and the target canâ€™t be Charmed, Frightened, or Possessed by them.
